verbs.description: [ARG0: smoky sweet potato chili] [V: adds] [ARG1: a little spice] [ARG2: to a sunday simmer] this smoky sweet potato chili keeps the chopping to a minimum opting instead for shortcuts from the shelf like a jar of salsa and some smoky chipotle peppers sweet potato potato
